verses.name: 2 Chronicles 15:10
verses.text: So they gathered themselves together at Jerusalem in the third month, in the fifteenth year of the reign of Asa.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 15:11
verses.text: And they offered unto the Lord the same time, of the spoil which they had brought, seven hundred oxen and seven thousand sheep.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 15:12
verses.text: And they entered into a covenant to seek the Lord God of their fathers with all their heart and with all their soul;

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 15:13
verses.text: That whosoever would not seek the Lord God of Israel should be put to death, whether small or great, whether man or woman.
